text:
The wind is so cold~...!
Are you okay, Kiririn?

Yeah...
I'm used to the cold...

Really? That's good then.
My hands are already in trouble. They're freezing.

Let's buy some hot drinks...!
Quick, warm up our fingers...!

Or maybe just go into a shop...!
I'm trying to persuade you, you know!

Hehe...
Alright... I'll go with you...
